      • buyStocks

        public boolean buyStocks(java.lang.String symbol,
                         int shares,
                         DBManager db)
        Buy stocks, log it to the database, and take the money away from the security account.
        Parameters:
        symbol - Symbol of stock to buy
        shares - Amount of shares to buy
        db - DBManager reference
        Returns:
        true if the purchase was successful

      • sellStocks

                          DBManager db)

        Parameters:
        symbol - Symbol of stock to sell
        shares - Amount of shares to sell
        db - DBManager reference
        Returns:
        true if the sell was successful
